text: Archibald or Archie Brown may refer to: * Archibald Brown (architect) (1881–1956), American architect * Archibald G. Brown (1844–1922), British minister * Archie Brown (historian) (born 1938), British political scientist and historian * Archie Brown (rugby) (1894–?), Welsh rugby player * Archie Scott Brown (1927–1958), British racing driver * Archie Brown (footballer) (born 2002), English footballer
title: Archibald Brown
